description:
Kouhei cannot reconcile the little vampire he has grown to love with the monster before his eyes. As the Puppet Master attacks, Hazuki must embrace Kouhei - and Kouhei must embrace his fear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Brother, Am I That Scary?
Onii-sama, Watashitte Sonna ni Hen Desuka?
おにいさま, わたしってそんなにヘンですか?
